title: C
details: Low-level compiled language for memory management, concurrency, embedded systems, and networking.
source: Systems-level development (malloc, threadpools, HTTP server, CHIP-8 emulator), CLI tools

title: C++
details: Mid-level programming language combining object-oriented and low-level memory manipulation capabilities.
source: CLI tool development and academic systems programming (memory management, OOP)

title: Rust
details: Systems programming language emphasizing safety, speed, and concurrency without a garbage collector.
source: Academic systems programming practice, studying ownership/memory safety principles

title: Makefile
details: Makefile scripting defines build instructions and dependency rules for compiling code projects.
source: Build automation for C projects (emulators, servers, dynamic memory allocators)
